疺字的基本解释

疺
fá
瘦。
疲乏：“天气清爽，人马不渴，若暄热，人皆疺矣。”

疺
biǎn
病。

疺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《集韻》扶法切，入乏，奉。］
(1)瘦。
(2)用同“乏”。疲倦。

疺字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　疺； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页771第12
【集韻】【韻會】?扶法切，音乏。【玉篇】瘦也。　又【正字通】疲也。【明永樂北征錄】駕發鳴轂鎭，天氣淸爽，人馬不渴。若喧熱，人皆疺矣。　又【集韻】悲檢切，音貶。病也。

疺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
疺字的起名意思

暂无。

疺
Basic explanation of words
疺
fá
thin.
Tiredness: "The weather is refreshing, people and horses are not thirsty, if it is hot, everyone is sick."
疺
biǎn
disease.
疺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Jiyun" help the law cut, enter the lack, give. ]
(1) Thin.
(2) Use the same "worry". tired.
疺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　疺; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 771 No. 12
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Help the law cut, the sound is lacking. [Jade articles] Thin too.　[Zhengzitong] Weary too. [Mingyong Le Beizheng Records] Driving and humming, the weather is cool, and the horses and horses are not thirsty. If it is noisy and hot, everyone will be embarrassed.　[Jiyun] Sadly to examine and cut, the sound is degraded. Sick too.
